title: In-game lagging (macOS Sierra 10.12) [Gameplay] | Sluggish Client [Client]
body:
I am a Mac user playing on macOS Sierra version 10.12. I was told that LoL does not support 10.12 Sierra fully yet. But I just wanted to address a few issues. I encountered. While in-game, majority of the time there is a delay in the game/during attacks & teamfights. Lagging between all champions and minions. It ranges from light lag that last a few seconds to severe lag(delays) that last minutes.

With the client, I notice that its a little slowing trying to change tabs while in the store. Also I can not add items to my List. I try deleting the list and making a new one to no avail.

I would love to post a video of the lag during game, but I don't know how to record while in game.
If anyone else recently updated to Sierra on your mac and is running into problems/bugs, Post them.

replies.body:
We're currently having the bugs/issues with League and macOS Sierra posted to our [Bug Report Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I posted my response in the Bug Report Board first and then it was deleted/removed and told me to place it in the help & support section. So should I repost it back in the Bug section or will get deleted again.
I think if you clarify the post is a bug report and for tracking this specific issue with the mac client, it should be okay.

Does your ingame ping vary? Anything new in your home? Mac? router? ISP? Do you have a PC laptop to compare in the same household?
Try these Riot tutorials:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If nothing changes, you can contact Player Support and describe everything with as many details/attachments as possible.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Only when I start to lag does my ingame ping vary, most of the time it's pretty constant.  I currently play at school/on campus. The wifi her sucks, but it's playable and I never had problems before. I don't have a secondary PC. I submitted a request several days ago addressing everything. The player support said that League of Legends does support Mac El Capitan (OS X 10.11) but does not support Sierra (OS X 10.12) yet.
